sense.def:
One's speciality
je vrsta dela, pri katerem je nekdo najboljši, ali področje, o katerem ve največ.

seg.quote: Work with children is their speciality.
They enjoy talking about their own specialities.

sense.def:
A speciality of a place
je tisto, kar v nekem kraju naredijo odlično.

seg.quote: Chocolate gateau was a speciality of the Café de Rome.
